response.overview: Mr. Chen lends his priceless Ming Dynasty bronze cauldron, forged from an ancient Xuande-era meteorite, to Mr. Ren as the auspicious centerpiece for a hot spring hotel opening. Upon learning this, Chen’s secretary Qingqing recruits her boyfriend Lin Ziran and heartbroken best friend Feng Yuan to steal it back. Unbeknownst to them, three other groups target the cauldron: Chen’s subordinate Vincent, a mysterious operative named Lü, and two rookie thieves. Chaos erupts when Vincent and Lü separately commission the same forger to create fake replicas, sparking a frenzied four-way heist battle.
response.title: 鼎级疯狂
